Informant Jeff: Hey there, Cain.
\C[24][Cain]\C[0] Hey, Jeff.
heroine_1
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] An acquaintance?
\C[24][Cain]\C[0] Informant Jeff. He's a good friend of mine.

\C[24][Cain]\C[0] Information from an informant is expensive, but since we're friends, he does my
requests for free.
Informant Jeff: Come on, you know that's not how it works.
becky_1

\C[24][Becky]\C[0] To think that Informant Jeff is Cain's good friend. Jeff's information network
is amazing, so it'll be a big help.
\C[24][Cain]\C[0] By the way, Jeff, did you look into that matter I asked you about?
Informant Jeff: Yeah.
Informant Jeff: It was about 'Regnus Grahardt' and 'Rade', right?
Informant Jeff: ...
Informant Jeff: Sorry. I couldn't find much about those two.
\C[24][Cain]\C[0] Come on, you're supposed to be Informant Jeff.

Informant Jeff: I gathered information from my contacts, but their backgrounds
are a mystery.
Informant Jeff: However, there's a strange rumor about Regnus Grahardt.

Informant Jeff: It seems Regnus Grahardt has made a name for himself in the
Jupiterino kingdom several times before.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Made a name for himself?

Informant Jeff: There was an incident where high-ranking magicians from
Valentina were massacring low-ranking magicians in a village in Jupiterino for
fun. Basically, it was bullying.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] High-ranking magicians from Valentina did such a thing...
\C[24][Becky]\C[0] It's the usual. Many of Valentina's high-ranking magicians are arrogant.
\C[24][Cain]\C[0] Hey, are the high-ranking magicians of Valentina really that powerful?

\C[24][Becky]\C[0] Well, each one of them is a genius magician comparable to Luna. In other words,
they're elite magicians.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] So what happened then?

Informant Jeff: Who knows. But the high-ranking magicians from Valentina
disappeared from the village. They must have fled after seeing Regnus's power.

Informant Jeff: And then Regnus Grahardt left a parting gift in that village. A
gift to share his power with others.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] What kind of parting gift?

Informant Jeff: I don't know the details. But if you can get your hands on the
parting gift that Regnus Grahardt left behind, there might be a chance for Luna
to beat Lucia.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] The parting gift left by Regnus Grahardt...

\C[24][Cain]\C[0] Wait a minute. What happened to the village that Regnus Grahardt saved? If we
go there, we might find the parting gift, right?

Informant Jeff: Unfortunately, Sylvia from Valentina ended up slaughtering all
the villagers. Women, children, the elderly—she killed them all as a show of
force. So now we don't know where the parting gift is.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] That's terrible... A massacre...
\C[24][Becky]\C[0] That Sylvia...

\C[24][Cain]\C[0] I see. If there's no parting gift, then we have no choice but to look for
Regnus Grahardt. He's not a bad guy, right? He'll become our ally.

Informant Jeff: Not a bad guy? Become an ally? That's hard to say. He's an
enigma. His age and gender are unknown. Rather than helping, there's also a
possibility that he used the villagers as test subjects.
Informant Jeff: And as for the parting gift, who knows what's really inside it.

Informant Jeff: That's all I have on Regnus Grahardt. There are rumors he's
appeared elsewhere, but there's no confirmation.
Informant Jeff: As for Rade, I've got nothing at all.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Sylvia... Lucia... I will never forgive you.

Informant Jeff: Hey, hey, Luna, are you planning to make enemies with not just
Lucia but Valentina as well? Stop it, you guys can't handle this on your own.

\C[24][Becky]\C[0] But... if we, the resistance, don't put up a fight, innocent people will be
slaughtered just like in that village.

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Jeff-san. I can't just sit still. My magic was sealed by Lucia, but the seal
was broken by Rade-san.

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] My blue magic has also been revived. I can learn techniques from exceptionally
strong enemies again.

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Jeff-san, could you tell me where to find monsters that use rare techniques? I
want to learn as many powerful skills as possible.
Informant Jeff: Monsters that use rare techniques, huh.

Informant Jeff: There's information that monsters using special techniques
occasionally appear in 'Seren Forest'. Whether you encounter that monster or not
is up to you, Luna. Want me to tell you where it is?

\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Monsters in 'Seren Forest' that use special techniques, got it. Please tell me
the location of Seren Hill.

Informant Jeff: Alright. Luna, I've taken a liking to you. The information is
free of charge.
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Thank you very much!
※'Seren Forest' has been unlocked on the field map.
other/map_guide
other/map__mark2
Informant Jeff: Seren Forest is at this location. Be careful out there.
\C[24][Cain]\C[0] Next, we're heading to the 'Rare Shop'. We're going to get a "Communicator".

\C[24][Cain]\C[0] This is the 'Rare Shop'. They have unusual items. It's also famous as a niche
store.

Jeff the Informant: "I'll dig up some more useful information for you. Keep up
the good work."
Informant Jeff: Hey there, Luna.

Informant Jeff: You were asking where the ingredients for Noah's leg medicine
are located, right?

\C[24][Cain]\C[0] Don't worry. I've found the ingredients for the medicine that slows down the
necrosis of the leg.
heroine_1
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Really!? Where can we find the ingredients for the medicine!?
Informant Jeff: The ingredients for the medicine are in "Gra's Cave."
other/map_guide
other/map__mark3
Informant Jeff: Gra's Cave is located here. Be careful.
heroine_2
\C[23][Luna]\C[0] Thank you so much!
Luna and her companions immediately headed for "Gra's Cave."

Information Dealer Jeff: You gave away the Gra herbs to people in need? Well...
that's so like you, Luna. Hmm, I can't think of any herb that could replace it.
For now, I'll gather various pieces of information for you.

Information Broker Jeff: Luna, I've heard the news. You're heading to Norvana,
huh? I had a feeling you might someday.

Information Broker Jeff: Norvana is a resistance fighting on the front lines
against the imperial capital, but they're struggling against the direct
descendant and sorceress Lucia. If you go there, Luna, you'll surely be
welcomed.

Information Broker Jeff: To get to Norvana, you must go through "Sefi Forest."
It's going to be a long journey. The closer you get to the front lines, the
tougher the enemies will become. There are sorcerers from Valentina there. Be
careful.
other/map_guide
other/map__mark4
Information Broker Jeff: Sefi Forest is located here. Take care.
Luna and her companions headed for "Sefi Forest."

Informant Jeff: "Luna, don't forget about prostituting yourself. Shena Village
is in poverty due to the kingdom's punishment. If Luna and Becky turn to
prostitution, you could make a fortune in no time. Hehehe."
Gained 300G.
